https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nQOh2FruQijwiR3e35qzLjFdWGj.jpg Summer '76, there's a heatwave and the Swiss countryside is drying out at top speed. In this stifling environment, Gus who is thirteen years old and son of a farmer, sees both his family environment and his innocence relentlessly breaking. He's living the end of a world. Beyond the Horizon
